Package nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard

Class Dashboard

java.lang.Object
nl.han.ica.oopg.objects.GameObject
nl.han.ica.oopg.dashboard.Dashboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
IKeyInput, IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
FPSCounter
public class Dashboard
extends GameObject
Create or extend this class to create a new dashboard, a dashboard object will be drawn above the ViewPort when added to the dashboard list inside the GameEngine (addDashboard).

    • addGameObject

      public void addGameObject​(GameObject gameObject)
      Add a GameObject to the dashboard.
      Parameters:
      gameObject - The GameObject that will be added to the canvas. Sets the X and Y relatively to the canvas, so the GameObjects will move with the dashboard.
